description: This Dart source file defines the MockServices class which provides mock implementations for various asynchronous services such as AI answering, linking Plaid and broker accounts, and retrieving lessons and leaderboard data. It is used for testing or development purposes within a Flutter frontend project.

classes.name: MockServices
classes.description: A class providing mock implementations of service methods for AI responses, account linking, lessons, and leaderboard data.

methods.name: aiAnswer
methods.description: Asynchronously returns a simulated AI response based on the provided symbol and question.

methods.name: linkPlaid
methods.description: Simulates linking a Plaid account, returning a success message after a delay.

methods.name: linkBroker
methods.description: Simulates linking a broker account, returning a success message after a delay.

methods.name: lessons
methods.description: Returns a list of Lesson objects representing educational content.

methods.name: leaderboard
methods.description: Returns a list of LeaderboardEntry objects representing user rankings.
